translation.en: [man over intercom] Number one, step forward and face the mirror.
Number two.
Number three.
Four.
Have another look at this one, ma'am…
translation.de: Sehen Sie sich die noch mal an.

translation.en: if you get my meaning.
We're talking about violent killings. Murder, ma'am.
translation.de: Wir reden von gewaltsamen Morden, Ma'am.

translation.en: Is this not the woman you saw?
translation.de: Haben Sie nicht diese Frau gesehen?

translation.en: [man] Zenzile Mwale.
Zenzi. Do you… Do you mind if I call you Zenzi?
translation.de: Zenzi… Darf ich Sie Zenzi nennen?

translation.en: You've had quite a week, huh?
A trail of bodies all over the damn city.
Dead criminals falling from the sky.
Right. Start talking. Why did you murder these men?
translation.de: So, reden Sie. Warum haben Sie diese Männer ermordet?

translation.en: Eyewitnesses, CCTV cameras, they put you on the scene.
You're caught red-handed.
What the hell are you mixed up in?
translation.de: In was sind Sie da verwickelt?

translation.en: Who are you?
I am just a cleaner.
Hey, you.
So, how's the little guy doing?
translation.de: Wie geht es dem kleinen Kerl?

translation.en: -[Zenzi] Who said it was a guy? -I can feel it. I'm sure it's a guy.
translation.de: -Ganz sicher Kerl? -Ich fühle es. Ist bestimmt ein Junge.

translation.en: Damn it.
[man] Ah. Morning, Zenzi.
Running late, hmm?
Morning, Mr. Booysen.
What have I told you? Call me Enrico.
translation.de: -Morgen, Mr. Booysen. -Was sagte ich? Nenn mich Enrico. Ich bin Vermieter, aber auch ein Freund.

translation.en: I'm your landlord, but I'm also a friend.
translation.de: Nenn mich Enrico. Ich bin Vermieter, aber auch ein Freund.

translation.en: Yes.
Thank you, Mr. Booysen.
You're three weeks late again. Enough is enough.
translation.de: Die Miete ist seit drei Wochen fällig. Es reicht jetzt.

translation.en: [Zenzi] I'm sorry, Mr. Booysen.
I've taken on extra shifts.
I'll make up the rent. Please.
I just need more time.
You know I'm here to help, na?
translation.de: Du weißt, ich will helfen, ja?

translation.en: If we need to put our heads together and, uh, make a plan.
translation.de: Falls wir gemeinsam einen Plan aufstellen müssen.

translation.en: I just don't want to see you out on the street.
translation.de: Ich will dich nur nicht auf der Straße sehen.

translation.en: Not after…
You know?
And without a man to protect you.
translation.de: Und ohne einen Mann zum Schutz.

translation.en: Well…
today's the day.
-Today? -[Zenzi] Hmm.
Max is coming home.
-Good. Maybe now I'll see my money. -[door opens]
translation.de: Gut. Vielleicht sehe ich dann mein Geld.

translation.en: [woman in Afrikaans] Enrico! Where are you?
Your breakfast.
[woman in English] Summer! Mummy's home.
Ma'am, did you remember that today--
translation.de: -Ma'am, haben Sie… -Du hast doch Summer abgeholt.

translation.en: You didn't forget to collect Summer, did you, Zenzi?
translation.de: -Ma'am, haben Sie… -Du hast doch Summer abgeholt. Oder, Zenzi?

translation.en: Summer? [chuckles] No.
I've never even met her. Missed me!
[gasps] My sneaky little girl.
Oh! I did. I did. I did. Oh.
[boy] Mama?
[boy in Tswana] It's for Papa when you take me to visit him.
translation.de: Das ist für Papa, wenn wir hingehen.

translation.en: You promised.
[Zenzi] I know, baby. I know.
[in English] Uh, ma'am.
I need to leave a bit early today.
translation.de: Ich muss heute etwas früher los.

translation.en: It's today?
That he gets out?
H-how long has it been?
Two years now.
Are you sure about this?
Come on, he put you through so much.
translation.de: Er hat dir so viel zugemutet.

translation.en: He's changed, ma'am.
Toxic men never change.
Sometimes it's best to leave our past behind us.
translation.de: Manchmal ist es am besten, die Vergangenheit hinter uns zu lassen.

translation.en: Okay?
Hello, sir. I'm here to fetch my husband, Maxwell Mwale.
translation.de: Hallo. Ich möchte meinen Mann abholen, Maxwell Mwale.

translation.en: Uh, wait over there.
[Zenzi] Oh, okay.
Hello.
[woman] I missed you.
-[pounding on door] -[Zenzi] Okay, okay, I'm coming.
Max Mwale, you're under arrest for the murder of Yazid Noordien.
translation.de: Maxwell Mwale, Sie sind verhaftet wegen Mordes an Yazid Noordien.

translation.en: [Zenzi] What?
-[in Tswana] What's going on? -[in English] I love you.
translation.de: Was ist los? Ich liebe dich.

translation.en: [in Tswana] No, wait.
-[in English] Move it! -This is a mistake. Wait.
-Max, what is this? -[siren blaring]
Who are you waiting for, sister? Um, my husband, Maxwell Mwale.
translation.de: -Auf wen wartest du, Schwester? -Auf meinen Mann, Maxwell Mwale.

translation.en: He was supposed to be released today at 5:00.
I got here just after 5:00. It says here he was released this morning.
translation.de: -Ich war kurz nach fünf da. -Er wurde heute Morgen entlassen.

translation.en: He's gone, sister.
He's gone?
[scoffs] No. [guard] I don't know what to tell you.
Your husband's a free man.
Congratulations. But he's not here.
translation.de: Glückwunsch. Aber er ist nicht hier.

translation.en: [whispering] Zenzi, do you know what time it is?
translation.de: Zenzi, weißt du, wie spät es ist?

translation.en: Alice, have you seen Max?
-Is this a joke? -No. No. He got out today.
translation.de: -Ist das ein Witz? -Nein. Er kam heute raus.

translation.en: But he's not home.
Well, if I saw him, I would chase him away unless he brings the rent.
translation.de: Ich würde ihn eh verjagen, es sei denn, er hätte die Miete.

translation.en: Anyway, you're better off without him. Count yourself lucky.
translation.de: Ohne ihn bist du besser dran. Du solltest froh sein.

translation.en: Did Enrico tell you? We're selling the house.
translation.de: Hat's Enrico gesagt? Wir verkaufen das Haus.

translation.en: We don't have a choice anymore.
You're gonna have to find somewhere else to live for free.
You've got till the end of the month to pack up your things.
translation.de: Bis Ende des Monats musst du gepackt haben.

translation.en: [Zenzi] I'd like to report a missing person, please.
translation.de: Ich möchte eine vermisste Person melden.

translation.en: Missing person?
Yes, my husband.
His name.
[in Afrikaans] Ay. It's these Zimbabweans again.
The husband is off with his mistress, and the wife comes to us to find him.
translation.de: Der Mann ist bei seiner Geliebten, und die Frau kommt zu uns.

translation.en: -[in English] Cry me a river. -[police officers laugh]
I can hear you.
I am not Zimbabwean. I'm from Bethlehem in the Free State.
translation.de: Ich bin keine Simbabwerin. Ich bin aus Bethlehem im Freistaat.

translation.en: And my husband is not with some mistress.
translation.de: Und mein Mann hat keine Geliebte.

translation.en: He got out of jail today. He was supposed to come home, but he didn't.
translation.de: Er kam heute aus dem Gefängnis und sollte heimkommen.

translation.en: So are you going to help me or not?
Look, these men are trouble, sister.
He's probably out drinking with friends, having a good time.
translation.de: Er trinkt sicher mit Freunden und amüsiert sich.

translation.en: Maybe you're better off.
Hi, this is Naledi.
Don't leave a voicemail. Just text me. Thanks, bye.
translation.de: Sprecht nicht drauf, simst mir einfach. Danke. Tschüs.

translation.en: Hi. I'm looking for this guy,
Max. -Have you seen him? -Huh-uh.
Hello.
I'm looking for this guy. Have you seen him? Max.
translation.de: Ich suche diesen Mann. Haben Sie ihn gesehen? Max.

translation.en: [man] Hey.
I know you.
Max's piece of ass.
Wait. You know Max?
translation.de: Warte. -Du kennst Max? -Max ist im Gefängnis.

translation.en: Max is in jail, sister.
-No, no, he got out. -Well, he's not here.
translation.de: -Nein, er ist rausgekommen. -Nun, hier ist er nicht.

translation.en: You need a new man to warm your bed, eh? [chuckles]
translation.de: Brauchst du einen neuen Mann fürs Bett?

translation.en: No. No. Leave me. Leave me.
Fuck off, you drunk shit.
Well, if Max isn't in jail, he's dead.
translation.de: Wenn Max nicht im Knast ist, ist er tot.

translation.en: So fuck him. And fuck you!
translation.de: Also scheiß auf ihn. Und fick dich!

translation.en: What are you playing, coming here?
I was just trying to find my husband.
He wasn't at the prison, and he didn't come home.
translation.de: Er kam vom Gefängnis nicht heim.

translation.en: I don't know where to look anymore.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, wo ich suchen soll.

translation.en: [sighs] No one will help me. I will help you.
Thank you, Mr. Booysen.
I… I really need to get home.
I will walk you home.
Safe.
[chuckles] Fuck.
Okay. Thank you, Mr. Booysen.
Anything you need…
I'm here.
Okay.
Good night, Mr. Booysen.
I should fix that door for you.
Oh, no, it's okay. I'm already used to it.
translation.de: Schon gut. Ich komme damit klar.

translation.en: [Enrico] And the rent?
Make a plan.
[Enrico] Zenzi.
-[Enrico] Zenzi, open the door. -[banging on door]
[Enrico] Bitch.
[Enrico] Zenzi, I'm just trying to help you.
translation.de: Zenzi, ich will dir nur helfen.

translation.en: [grunting] Zenzi.
Zenzi. Zenzi.
[Alice in Afrikaans] Enrico! Leave that bloody maid, before I put you both on the street!
translation.de: Enrico! Lass die verdammte Putze, bevor ich euch beide rausschmeiße!

translation.en: [Enrico in English] Fucking cock teaser.
No wonder he's not coming back. Anything to get away from you.
translation.de: Kein Wunder, dass er nicht zurückkommt. Hauptsache weg von dir.

translation.en: [judge] How do you plead?
[Max] Guilty.
I killed Yazid Noordien.
You do realize that if you are lying, not only are you in contempt of court,
translation.de: Sie wissen, wenn Sie lügen, missachten Sie nicht nur das Gericht.

translation.en: but you're leaving the real criminals on the street? I do.
translation.de: -Sie lassen den Täter frei herumlaufen. -Das weiß ich.

translation.en: I killed him.
Hello?
Who is this?
Max, is that you?
[Max] After everything I've done, why are you still here?
translation.de: Nach allem, was ich getan habe, bist du noch hier?

translation.en: [in Tswana] I am your wife, Max.
[in English] Esulu is your son.
I know who you really are.
translation.de: Ich weiß, wer du wirklich bist.

translation.en: [in Tswana] Then maybe this is my chance to change.
translation.de: Dann ist das vielleicht meine Chance,

translation.en: [in English] For the better.
Whatever it takes.
[Zenzi in Tswana] Why, Max?
[in English] What is it you're not telling me?
What are you involved in? Please, whatever it is…
translation.de: Worin bist du verwickelt? Was es auch ist…

translation.en: don't do it.
Ah. It's just you. I thought it was somebody important.
translation.de: Ach, du bist das nur. Ich dachte, es sei jemand Wichtiges.

translation.en: If living in your own filth is so important, I can leave.
translation.de: Wenn Sie im eigenen Dreck leben wollen, kann ich gehen.

translation.en: [groans] Well, you did come all this way.
translation.de: Na ja, wo du schon hier bist…

translation.en: [in Tswana] Is it Tuesday already?
I see you have been writing.
[sighs] Columns. For my sins.
translation.de: -Ich sehe, Sie haben geschrieben. -Kolumnen. Für meine Sünden.

translation.en: It's juice. I know what's good for me.
translation.de: Das ist Saft. Ich weiß, was gut für mich ist.

translation.en: After a week-long search led by local police,
Garth's body was ultimately recovered near a stream in Philippi.
translation.de: wurde Garths Leiche schließlich an einem Bach in Philippi gefunden.

translation.en: With me today are his daughter, Melanie, and wife, Karen,
translation.de: Bei mir sind heute seine Tochter Melanie und seine Frau Karen,

translation.en: who are recounting their harrowing journey in their hopes of finding justice…
translation.de: die von ihren erschütternden Erlebnissen auf der Suche nach Gerechtigkeit…

translation.en: Very intellectual.
[in Tswana] It's no Felicia, but it hits the spot.
translation.de: Es ist nicht Felicia, aber es passt.

translation.en: [in English] 1996 called.
[host on TV] And when did you know he wasn't coming home? That he was dead?
translation.de: Wann wusstest du, dass er nicht kommt, dass er tot ist?

translation.en: [Melanie on TV] He hadn't called. He always called.
translation.de: Er rief nicht an. Das tat er sonst immer.

translation.en: I just looked at my mom, and I knew.
translation.de: Ich sah nur meine Mom an und… ich wusste es.

translation.en: If you want to study humanity, you should watch daytime TV talk shows.
translation.de: Wenn du die Menschheit studieren willst, solltest du Talkshows gucken.

translation.en: [host] You suspect there might be more to it. [Melanie] There has to be more to it.
translation.de: -Du vermutest, es steckt mehr dahinter. -Es muss so sein.

translation.en: He had enemies. We knew this.
translation.de: Er hatte Feinde. Das wussten wir.

translation.en: The daughter did it.
-[Melanie] Our house is very secure. -What?
-Please. Look at her. -It has to have been someone he knew.
translation.de: -Bitte. Sieh sie dir an. -Er kannte seinen Mörder.

translation.en: It was her, the daughter.
Well, I see.
Well, when you have multiple awards for your investigative journalism,
translation.de: Wenn du mehrere Preise für deinen Investigativjournalismus hast

translation.en: and a Sunday Times bestseller, you can be the judge of character around here.
translation.de: und einen Sunday-Times-Bestseller, dann kannst du hier Leute einschätzen.

translation.en: No offense.
Well, Mr. Ngesi, if I did not clean up after you, I would think you were an arrogant ass.
translation.de: Mr. Ngesi, wäre ich nicht Ihre Putzfrau, hielte ich Sie für einen arroganten Arsch.

translation.en: [in Tswana] There's no underestimating you, Zenzi.
[in English] Indeed.
Hello.
[woman] Zenzi?
-It's not your day today. -I know.
But I can't come in later this week. A-and I really need to speak to Mr. Hendricks.
translation.de: Später in der Woche kann ich nicht. Und ich muss Mr. Hendricks sprechen.

translation.en: Please, Nancy.
I need the work.
Okay.
Thank you.
[Hendricks] I pay you to solve my problems. I don't pay you so I can solve my own problems. So fucking solve it.
translation.de: Hör zu, ich bezahle dich, damit du meine Probleme löst, also tu's.

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa, Zenzi, what the fuck are you doing here? What day is it?
translation.de: Zenzi, was tust du hier? Welcher Tag ist heute?

translation.en: Sorry, Mr. Hendricks. Nancy said I can work today.
translation.de: Nancy sagte, ich könnte heute arbeiten.

translation.en: [Hendricks] Nancy said.
Okay, but you're not supposed to see this shit.
translation.de: Ok, aber du sollst das nicht sehen.

translation.en: You can keep your mouth shut, right?
translation.de: -Du kannst den Mund halten? -Ich weiß, was Sie hier tun.

translation.en: I know what you do here, sir. I've worked here for a while now.
translation.de: -Du kannst den Mund halten? -Ich weiß, was Sie hier tun. -Ich bin hier nicht neu. -Ich weiß, nur…

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I know. Just… [grumbles]
translation.de: -Ich bin hier nicht neu. -Ich weiß, nur…

translation.en: …mind your own business and clean something.
"Keep it away from Zenzi. Just let her clean."
translation.de: "Halte Zenzi raus, lass sie putzen." Das wollte Max.

translation.en: That's all Max asked for. What the fuck am I supposed to do?
translation.de: "Halte Zenzi raus, lass sie putzen." Das wollte Max. Wie soll ich das tun?

translation.en: You're happy working here, right?
Yes. Yes. Of course, sir.
You've been good to us, sir. Don't you forget that.
translation.de: -Sie sind gut zu uns. -Vergiss das nicht.

translation.en: Um, I've been meaning to ask, sir--
I can't give you another advance, Zenzi. I wish this was my money, but it's not.
translation.de: Ich kann dir keinen Vorschuss geben. Ist leider nicht mein Geld.

translation.en: I'm not looking for money.
I'm looking for Max.
-Max is in jail. -No, he got out. Yesterday.
translation.de: -Max ist im Knast. -Nein, er kam gestern raus.

translation.en: What are you telling me?
Nobody told me. Nobody fucking told me. Somebody's getting cut up for this.
translation.de: Niemand hat es mir gesagt. Irgendjemand wird dafür büßen.

translation.en: Fuck.
You know Max is welcome here, right? So where the fuck is he?
translation.de: Du weißt, dass Max hier willkommen ist. Also wo ist er?

translation.en: That's what I'm asking you, sir.
I went to fetch him yesterday, but…
translation.de: Ich war ihn gestern abholen, aber…

translation.en: he wasn't there. I… I… I can't find him.
translation.de: Er war nicht da. Ich finde ihn nicht.

translation.en: Okay, listen…
you and me, we need to find Max.
There's a lot of shit happening out there, okay? A lot of unfinished business.
translation.de: Da draußen ist viel los, viele unerledigte Dinge.

translation.en: And would, uh, would Jackson know? Jackson Thom, your partner.
translation.de: Und würde Jackson es wissen? Jackson Thom, Ihr Partner.

translation.en: Jackson Thom is no partner of mine, okay? He's a fucking sociopath.
translation.de: Jackson Thom ist nicht mein Partner. Er ist ein Soziopath.

translation.en: I'm warning you, Zenzi. Stay away from him. He's dangerous. And Max owes him money.
translation.de: Ich warne dich, er ist gefährlich. Und Max schuldet ihm Geld.

translation.en: And if Jackson knows Max is out, that is a bad move for Max.
translation.de: Weiß er, dass Max draußen ist, ist das schlecht für Max.

translation.en: Fuck.
You and me, we're gonna stay far away from Jackson. You hear me?
translation.de: Wir beide halten uns von Jackson fern. Verstanden?

translation.en: -Okay. -[Hendricks] What the fuck?
[man] Fuck, Raymond.
Those fuckers moved on us. Jackson's guys.
-We took some hits. -[Hendricks] Those motherfuckers!
You… You get out of here, okay?
translation.de: Du haust hier jetzt ab, ok?

translation.en: Leave it with me. I'll find Max.
Move him to the back.
Those motherfuckers. Put him down.
Just put him down.
[Nancy] See you next week.
-[Hendricks] Where the fuck is Joseph? -[man] We don't know. He wasn't there.
translation.de: -Bis nächste Woche. -Wo ist Joseph? Er war nicht da.

translation.en: [Zenzi] Nancy.
Do you know where I can find Jackson Thom? It's important.
translation.de: Weißt du, wo ich Jackson Thom finde? Es ist wichtig.

translation.en: -[injured man grunting] -[Hendricks] Bite on this. Bite! Fuck.
Nancy, please.
[Hendricks] This is a fucking mess.
Do you remember that night when I told Bevan that you were with me?
translation.de: Ich sagte ja damals Bevan, dass du bei mir warst.

translation.en: When you were…
Ruthless, Zenzi. Ruthless.
Hi.
I'm looking for a job.
Yeah, the boss is over there.
[Zenzi shouts] Excuse me!
Hello.
I'm looking for the boss. Well, the boss isn't here.
translation.de: -Ich suche den Chef. -Der Chef ist nicht hier.

translation.en: I can take a message. Are you Jackson?
Am I supposed to know you? Who sent you?
translation.de: Kenne ich Sie? Wer schickt Sie?

translation.en: I'm looking for my husband.
I know you. You work for Raymond.
translation.de: Ich kenne dich. Du arbeitest für Raymond.

translation.en: What do you do? Clean his toilets?
translation.de: Was tust du? Seine Klos putzen?

translation.en: You're Max's little wife. You don't need to answer. I know that.
translation.de: Du bist Max' Frauchen. Sag nichts, ich weiß Bescheid.

translation.en: It's my business to know things.
Honestly…
he was better off inside.
'Cause outside, they can't protect him.
Max, he owes me… a lot.
I've been sitting here, waiting for him to knock on my door.
translation.de: Ich warte hier darauf, dass er an meine Tür klopft.

translation.en: Wondering that…
if he doesn't show…
am I going to need collateral?
Now I'm wondering…
if collateral didn't just walk into my workshop.
-It has nothing to do with me. -Oh, that's where you're wrong.
translation.de: -Das hat nichts mit mir zu tun. -Falsch.

translation.en: It's got everything to do with you.
translation.de: Es hat alles mit dir zu tun.

translation.en: Until Max pays me, whatever's Max's is mine.
translation.de: Bis Max mich bezahlt, gehört sein Besitz mir.

translation.en: And I might as well enjoy it. [exclaims] No! No!
translation.de: -Und ich kann mit ihm Spaß haben. -Nein!

translation.en: [Jackson] You should put that away.
You might hurt yourself.
translation.de: Du tust dir noch was an.

translation.en: [Zenzi] Don't come closer. I'll… I'll just leave.
[coughing] Fucking bitch.
Fuck! [coughs, grunts]
What the fuck?
Help.
Help. Help.
[Zenzi] Hey. Hey.
No, no, no, no, no, no. No.
[shakily] No, no.
[crying] Wait.
Jackson, please, no.
Jackson! Jackson!
-Hello? -[Mr. Ngesi] It was the daughter.
You were right. The daughter killed her father.
translation.de: Sie hat wirklich ihren Vater getötet.

translation.en: I don't know how you knew it, but you hit the nail right on the head.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, wie du drauf kamst, aber es war ein Volltreffer.

translation.en: Hello?
Are you there?
Yes, sir. I'm here.
Well, actually, I wanted to speak to you about a new idea for a book.
translation.de: Eigentlich wollte ich mit dir eine neue Buchidee besprechen.

translation.en: [sighs] Maybe better when you get here.
I think you're actually gonna like this one.
Hello?
Zenzile, is everything okay?
I'm fine.
[inhales sharply] I'll call you later, okay?
translation.de: Ich rufe Sie später an, ok?

translation.en: Just drop by when you get the--
[Mr. Ngesi] What do we really know about the invisible women in our lives?
translation.de: Was wissen wir über die unsichtbaren Frauen in unserem Leben?

translation.en: They wash our clothes,
sweep our floors, know us better than we know ourselves,
translation.de: fegen unsere Böden, kennen uns besser als wir selbst,

translation.en: sometimes more than we'd like to admit.
translation.de: manchmal besser, als wir zugeben wollen.

translation.en: How often do we reach out into their lives
translation.de: Wie oft greifen wir in ihr Leben ein,

translation.en: the way they seamlessly move in and out of ours?
translation.de: so wie sie unseres betreten und wieder verlassen.

translation.en: Do we dare to look outside of our self-involved lives?
translation.de: Trauen wir uns, über unser selbstbezogenes Leben hinauszublicken?

translation.en: But one momentary interaction can remind even an aging narcissist
translation.de: Aber ein kurzer Austausch kann sogar einen alternden Narzissten daran erinnern,

translation.en: that there's life outside of our own.
translation.de: dass es noch andere Leben gibt,

translation.en: A rich tapestry of stories,
tragedy, resilience.
I want to write a new story.
translation.de: Ich schreibe eine neue Geschichte. DAS UNSCHEINBARE

translation.en: The story of a woman, softly-spoken, unremarkable
translation.de: Die Geschichte einer Frau, die leise und unauffällig ist,

translation.en: but with a dignity of strength I haven't often seen,
translation.de: aber deren Kraft eine Würde hat, wie man sie selten sieht.

translation.en: who's taken knock after knock but finds the strength to get back up,
translation.de: Die viel einstecken musste, aber immer wieder aufsteht.

translation.en: a woman I'd like to call a friend. To a younger man, maybe even more.
translation.de: Eine Frau, die ich gern als Freundin eines jungen Mannes bezeichnen würde.

translation.en: Who's seen the worst of heartbreak, but who has resolved to live,
translation.de: Sie hat viel Schmerz erfahren, doch sie will weiterleben,

translation.en: to live with the best of hearts and make the right decisions, always.
translation.de: mit reinem Herzen und den richtigen Entscheidungen.

translation.en: [Mr. Ngesi] What will happen to this woman
translation.de: Was wird mit dieser Frau passieren,

translation.en: when the world around her is in chaos…
translation.de: wenn um sie herum das Chaos ausbricht?

translation.en: [Hendricks] Quick! Get those boxes out of here.
[Mr. Ngesi] …when her limits are tested, her principles,
translation.de: Wenn ihre Grenzen auf die Probe gestellt werden,

translation.en: when her back is against the wall?
translation.de: sie mit dem Rücken zur Wand steht?

translation.en: -Then we'll see who she really is. -[Hendricks] You, hurry up!
translation.de: Dann sehen wir, wer sie wirklich ist.

translation.en: Zenzi, this is not a good time.
Nancy, move it. This is the first place they're gonna come to.
translation.de: Nancy, schnell. Da schauen sie zuerst.

translation.en: They're coming right fucking now. Twenty minutes max. Wipe the drives.
translation.de: Sie kommen in maximal 20 Minuten. Lösch die Festplatten.

translation.en: Joseph, you take the car and get out of here.
translation.de: Joseph, hau mit dem Auto ab.

translation.en: If they're gonna search this place, the only thing they're gonna find is the finest cuts of tomahawk steaks, you get me?
translation.de: Sie sollen hier nur erstklassige Tomahawk-Steaks finden, klar?

translation.en: You.
You shouldn't be here right now.
Okay, motherfuckers, move it! It's day zero!
translation.de: Ok, ihr Penner, bewegt euch! Es ist der Tag Null!

translation.en: Okay.
Holy mother of fuck.
Jackson Thom is dead.
The guy you came to ask about just a few hours ago, he's dead.
translation.de: Der Typ, nach dem du vor ein paar Stunden fragtest, ist tot.

translation.en: But somehow I get the feeling you already know that, don't you?
translation.de: Aber das weißt du schon, oder?

translation.en: The whole fucking city's gonna think that I did it and with my own gun.
translation.de: Man wird denken, ich hätte es mit meiner Waffe getan.

translation.en: Ray. -They're here. -[Raymond] You stay here.
And don't you say a fucking word, you got me? And hide that thing.
translation.de: Du sagst kein Wort, verstanden? Und versteck das Ding.

translation.en: Uys and Van der Merwe, I want you in there. Thorough checks, okay?
translation.de: Ihr geht da rein und sucht alles gründlich durch.

translation.en: Twala, Bennett, that side. Even the freezers.
translation.de: Twala, Bennett, diese Seite. Auch die Tiefkühltruhen.

translation.en: You, I want you in there.
Check hard drives, files, boxes, computers…
translation.de: Überprüf die Festplatten, Akten, Kisten, Computer…

translation.en: Come on. The rest follow me.
I want you on that side. Bring me anything significant.
translation.de: Diese Seite, bringt mir alles, was von Bedeutung ist.

translation.en: Let's go.
You sure no one followed you?
[Joseph] Got out just in time, I guess. Drove around a couple hours.
translation.de: Ich kam wohl rechtzeitig raus, dann fuhr ich ein paar Stunden herum.

translation.en: -What's going on, boss? -[Hendricks] I wish I fucking knew.
translation.de: -Was ist los, Boss? -Das wüsste ich gern.

translation.en: -Somehow Max is right in the middle of it. -Max?
Max and his bitch wife.
She took my gun and some cash, and now Jackson is dead.
translation.de: Sie nahm meine Waffe und Geld, und nun ist Jackson tot.

translation.en: Everyone is gonna think it was us.
translation.de: Man wird denken, wir waren es.

translation.en: [sighs] And Blessing?
The devil himself.
Right on cue.
[Blessing on phone] You've really fucked things up now, huh?
translation.de: Ihr habt es wirklich vermasselt, was?

translation.en: What part of "keep the peace" don't you motherfuckers understand?
translation.de: Welchen Teil von "Frieden bewahren" versteht Ihr nicht?

translation.en: [Hendricks] I'm looking into it.
[Blessing] Yes, you are. Come and see me.
[Joseph] If you go,
you might not come back.
[Hendricks] I know. But I'm working on something.
translation.de: Ich weiß. Aber ich arbeite an etwas.

translation.en: Hello?
[in Tswana] Is it you?
[in English] I really need you.
Hello?
[driver in Afrikaans] Hey! Get in!
Friend…
What happened?
[man] There.
Let's have a chat.
You were at Raymond Hendricks's business earlier today.
translation.de: Sie waren heute in Raymond Hendricks' Firma.

translation.en: I…
You clean for Raymond Hendricks?
-I do. -[detective] And?
And I went there today…
even though it wasn't my day to work.
translation.de: Auch wenn ich heute nicht dran war.

translation.en: I just…
I was going because I was trying to find my husband.
translation.de: Ich habe versucht, meinen Mann zu finden.

translation.en: Mr. Hendricks couldn't help me either.
translation.de: Mr. Hendricks konnte mir nicht helfen.

translation.en: And so…
He left it open.
I don't know why I took it.
I wasn't even thinking. I was just trying to find Max.
translation.de: Ich dachte nicht mal nach, ich wollte nur Max finden.

translation.en: [detective] We have reason to believe
Raymond's involved in organized criminal activity.
Did you see any drugs at the butchery or weapons?
translation.de: Haben Sie im Schlachthaus Drogen oder Waffen gesehen?

translation.en: I'm just a cleaner.
Does the name "Jackson Thom" mean anything to you?
translation.de: Sagt Ihnen der Name Jackson Thom etwas?

translation.en: [detective] He was found dead today, and we think it was a gangland hit.
translation.de: Er wurde heute ermordet, vermutlich im Auftrag einer Bande.

translation.en: We think your husband could be involved.
translation.de: Wir denken, Ihr Mann könnte involviert sein.

translation.en: We understand there's history there. When's the last time you saw him?
translation.de: Es wäre nicht das erste Mal. Wann haben Sie ihn zuletzt gesehen?

translation.en: A week ago. [detective] Do you perhaps have a recent photograph of him?
translation.de: -Vor einer Woche. -Haben Sie ein aktuelles Foto von ihm?

translation.en: [Zenzi] Do you know where I can find Jackson Thom? It's important.
translation.de: Weißt du, wo ich Jackson Thom finde? Es ist wichtig.

translation.en: [detective] That's our guy.
Hold on.
If you hear from your husband, if you see him, if you can think of anything,
translation.de: Falls Ihr Mann sich meldet oder Ihnen sonst irgendwas einfällt,

translation.en: I want to know.
And woman to woman,
translation.de: Und so von Frau zu Frau,

translation.en: I can help you out of a scene you don't want to be any part of.
translation.de: ich kann Sie aus dieser Situation herausholen.

translation.en: Are you gonna tell me what happened?
translation.de: Sagst du mir, was passiert ist?

translation.en: Maybe another time.
Tonight…
We cannot have that type of disruption happening here.
translation.de: darf es hier so ein Chaos nicht geben.

translation.en: If you are involved in something, we cannot have it.
translation.de: Wenn du in irgendwas verwickelt bist, dulden wir das nicht.

translation.en: I know.
I'm sorry, sir. I…
And I'm not involved in anything. It's your first warning.
translation.de: -Ich bin in nichts verwickelt. -Deine erste Warnung.

translation.en: Asshole.
Friend…
you've gotta stand up for yourself.
[Zenzi] What do you want?
Just to talk.
Then talk.
I have a job offer.
From Raymond.
Another target.
I am not a killer for hire. [man] So far so good, I say.
translation.de: -Ich bin keine Auftragskillerin. -So weit, so gut.

translation.en: Get in, get out… unsuspected.
You're invisible.
No.
[man] Do it, and you get paid for your trouble.
translation.de: Tu es und du wirst entlohnt.

translation.en: But don't… [inhales]
…and the police might learn who really pulled the trigger on Jackson Thom.
translation.de: …und die Polizei erfährt, wer Jackson Thom getötet hat.

translation.en: They won't believe you.
They will believe it's Max. My husband is not a murderer.
translation.de: -Aber dass es Max war. -Er ist kein Mörder.

translation.en: He should've taken the money and done the time like he was told. But Max…
translation.de: Er hätte das Geld nehmen und seine Zeit absitzen sollen. Aber Max…

translation.en: Max had to fuck around with the wrong people.
translation.de: Max legte sich mit den falschen Leuten an.

translation.en: Who did Max take the fall for?
Why? [man] All you need to know is
if Max hadn't stepped out of line, your son would still be alive.
translation.de: Wäre Max brav gewesen, wäre euer Sohn noch am Leben.

translation.en: The boy didn't have to die. It's all Max's fault.
translation.de: Der Junge hätte nicht sterben müssen. Max ist schuld.

translation.en: [announcer over PA system] The next train does not stop here.
translation.de: Der nächste Zug hält hier nicht.

translation.en: Just a friendly reminder.
What happened to Esulu could easily happen-- Don't you say his name.
translation.de: -Was Esulu passiert ist, kann auch… -Nimm seinen Namen nicht in den Mund.

translation.en: Did he even shed a tear when he found out his soft little son was dead?
translation.de: Hat er nur eine Träne vergossen, als er erfuhr, dass sein Sohn tot war?
